name: MorphoMiam
description:
MorphoMIAM is a little game about a creature which lives in a pacific forest.
The goal of the game is to survive by eating fruits around the area. Some fruits will allow the creature to shapeshift, and to be able to swim, jump, and climb around.

This game has been made with passion and care during the Kissyourteacher 2021 GameJam by a team of 4-5 people.

- DOWNLOAD LINK AT THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE -
